comment_body:
The wide eyed, frantic woman was FROTHING at the mouth.

It means something very, very different with that small typo.

Frothing is the production of froth, and frotting is a gay sex act. Quite different.
Heaven's Gate tea, now that's clever. Jim Jones and his cult would be proud that the Kool-Aid was elevated to tea.
This would be good as part of a spooky anthology series!!
Must be some good tea. I'll give you my left foot if you give me a cup.
Good story, but the structure fell apart a bit in the last two paragraphs. I would recommend adding a new paragraph for every time the person saying the dialogue changes.
They're branching out and rebranding their image.
The first one is always free.
You're welcome, dude! Overall, great story though.
